text: Eghtɨ ingangarir gumazim an ekiam ifongezir arazibagh fozir puvatɨghɨva, egh a uabɨ mɨsoghamin arazibar amutɨ, an ekiam dughiar avɨribar a ifozoreghan kogham. Tina bar bizir avɨriba ini, a ua bizir avɨriba God danɨngam. Ezɨma tina God bizir avɨriba an dafarim garɨki, God uam a dam avɨriba inisɨva an azangsɨgham.”
